PHRASE.LANG: Feel like Balrog from Street Fighter IV with this exciting pair of trunks! If you want to go pro, you have to dress like it first! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Balrog de Street Fighter IV avec ce short ! Pour être un pro, il faut s'habiller comme un pro ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit dieser aufregenden Sporthose wie Balrog aus Street Fighter IV! Wer ein Profi sein will, muss vorher schon wie einer aussehen! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Balrog di Street Fighter IV con questi calzoncini! Per essere un vero pugile, vestiti come uno di loro! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte estos pantalones cortos y siéntete como Balrog de Street Fighter IV! ¡Dignos de un campeón! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 バイソンになりきることができるズボン プロボクサーを目指すならこのズボン！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 발로그가 되는 바지. 프로 복서를 목표로 하고 있다면 이 바지! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Balrog from Street Fighter IV with this exciting pair of trunks! If you want to go pro, you have to dress like it first! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
